name: Space Adventures
description:
Space Adventures is an arcade bullet-hell with RPG elements in outer space.

An endless adventure in the middle of empty space. You will have to fight off endless
waves of enemy ships, pumping your own and moving forward through space.
Be careful, your opponents are getting stronger and stronger every time!

Features:
- Multiple unique opponents with smart progression, depending on your level.
- The ship's pumping system.
- An endless race for new records.
- Nice graphics.
